titles.title: Recognizing the importance of Tribal colleges and universities to the United States and expressing support for designating the week beginning February 5, 2024, as "National Tribal Colleges and Universities Week".

Recognizing the importance of Tribal colleges and universities to the United States and expressing support for designating the week beginning February 5, 2024, as "National Tribal Colleges and Universities Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Tribal Colleges and Universities Week.
